title: Checking a dog into a daycare or hotel
context: Drop your pet off and give the worker their food and toys.

content.bestLine: I'd like to check my dog in for the day, please.

How will you care for my dog?
Please let me know if there are any issues.
Can you provide updates throughout the day?
I'd appreciate any photos or videos.

informal.text: Hey, I'm dropping off my pup.
Got all their stuff right here.
Can I get a quick rundown?
I'll be back to pick them up later.
Thanks so much for taking care of them!

formal.text: I would like to check in my dog, please.
I have completed the necessary paperwork.
Could you please inform me of your policies?
I would appreciate regular updates on my dog's status.
Please ensure my dog receives proper care.
I will return to collect my dog at the designated time.
